items.sentence: Tom could sing quite well when he was a child.
I don\'t speak French as well as I\'d like to.
I don\'t think Tom knows I think he\'s stupid.
Tom flexed his muscles in front of the mirror.
Tom sustained severe injuries in the accident.
Tom thanked Mary for her patience and support.
A man with a gun told Tom to get into the car.
I didn\'t want to do that as badly as Tom did.
I don\'t remember where I bought these gloves.
Tom and Mary are both in Boston, aren\'t they?
